creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: five panels woven with red warp; colors range from light blue, red, purple, teal, to gray and black; lined on back with navy fabric with yellow, green, and brown thin stripes; strip of tan Velcro (loop) along top edge on verso
markings: Thomas Murray Collection label on back: JAP 6079
title: Multi-color blanket of Nanbu split weave made in Aomori Prefecture
